# Mobile RASP Security

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn to build Certified Secure™ mobile RASP security in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, test, release, and monitor lifecycle of Android & iOS mobile RASP security, anti-tampering, anti-debugging, mobile app shielding, mobile app hardening, anti-resigning, and more. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/).
